hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents one minute.

$3{:}10$ is $10$ minutes after $3{:}00$. 

![The number line goes from 0 to 60 with marks at every 10 minutes. 0 is labeled 3:00 and 60 is labeled 4:00. Marks divide the space between each number into 10 equal parts. The label 3:10 is at 10.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7a7a4a03113e08eacdac30a54d6b89da7bb76945) 

So, we move $10$ tick marks past $3{:}00$.

This number line shows $3{:}10$ graphed:

![The number line goes from 0 to 60 with marks at every 10 minutes. 0 is labeled 3:00 and 60 is labeled 4:00. Marks divide the space between each number into 10 equal parts. Point B is labeled at 10.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8a77c45c6a108c3d96f1074a3c8842660697f310)

question.content:
**On which number line is $3{:}10$ graphed?**
